_comment: Curated skill registry for skills.sh integration

skills.name: React Best Practices
skills.description: Performance optimization rules for React and Next.js applications including memoization, code splitting, and rendering optimizations
skills.author: Vercel Labs

skills.name: Prompt Engineering
skills.description: Best practices for crafting effective prompts for Claude and other LLMs, including structured outputs and chain-of-thought reasoning
skills.author: Anthropic

skills.name: TypeScript Strict Mode
skills.description: Enforce strict TypeScript patterns including null safety, type guards, and inference optimization
skills.author: Microsoft

skills.name: Go Best Practices
skills.description: Idiomatic Go patterns including error handling, concurrency, interfaces, and testing
skills.author: Go Team

skills.name: Modern Python
skills.description: Modern Python patterns including type hints, async/await, dataclasses, and Python 3.12+ features
skills.author: Python Foundation

skills.name: Tailwind Design System
skills.description: Consistent UI patterns using Tailwind CSS including responsive design, dark mode, and component patterns
skills.author: Tailwind Labs

skills.name: Docker Best Practices
skills.description: Efficient containerization patterns including multi-stage builds, security hardening, and optimization
skills.author: Docker

skills.name: Kubernetes Patterns
skills.description: Production-ready Kubernetes patterns for deployments, services, and configuration management
skills.author: Kubernetes

skills.name: PostgreSQL Optimization
skills.description: Database optimization patterns including indexing strategies, query tuning, and schema design
skills.author: Supabase

skills.name: Security Best Practices
skills.description: Application security patterns including input validation, authentication, and OWASP top 10 prevention
skills.author: OWASP

skills.name: REST API Design
skills.description: RESTful API design patterns including versioning, error handling, and documentation
skills.author: SmartBear

skills.name: GraphQL Patterns
skills.description: GraphQL schema design, resolvers, and performance optimization patterns
skills.author: GraphQL Foundation

skills.name: Testing Patterns
skills.description: Comprehensive testing patterns including unit tests, integration tests, and test-driven development
skills.author: Testing Library

skills.name: Git Workflow
skills.description: Git best practices including branching strategies, commit conventions, and code review
skills.author: GitHub

skills.name: Web Accessibility
skills.description: WCAG compliance patterns for building accessible web applications
skills.author: A11Y Project

skills.name: Rust Patterns
skills.description: Idiomatic Rust patterns including ownership, lifetimes, and error handling
skills.author: Rust Foundation

skills.name: Vue Composition API
skills.description: Vue 3 Composition API patterns for building reactive applications
skills.author: Vue.js

skills.name: AWS Serverless
skills.description: Serverless architecture patterns for AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB
skills.author: AWS

skills.name: Monorepo Patterns
